Work Experience 
Feb 2015 – 
Present 
Senior Java Developer  
Code88 Company 
Develop betting system as a Team Leader: using Spring, 
MySQL, Restful Webservice , Cache, AngularJS, Ionic, 
JS/HTML/CSS … for programming. User can access the site to 
place bet the match and manage/setting user accounts. 
(https://www.pinnacle888.com/en/) 
 Design and implement agent system which manages 
Credit users: assign setting, report… 
 Design and implement in memory cache request data. 
 Review code and support other member to coding. 
 Manage the workload of the team. 
 Apply multiple threading and manage thread pool to 
improve performance. 
 Report status to Project Manager (Weekly Report). 
 Using English to communicate with Singapore/Malay 
team. 
Nov 2012 – Jan 
2015 
Java Developer  
CSC Company 
iPOS project : Working with other developers to develop 
Automation test tool: using Spring, Selenium, TestNG. The user 
(BA/QA) can use the tool to define testing script for santity 
test. 
 Design and implement. 
 Customize TestNG report. 
 Read data in excel to build test script. 
 Analysis and provide solution. 
Integral project: Working as developer to maintenance 
insurance product: using Java,  jsp/servlet to fix bug and 
implement new feature. Help team leader review code and guide 
team member to do task. 
 Design and implement. 
 Review code. 
 Read basic design document and write detail design 
document. 
 Analysis and provide solution. 
Phạm Trương Hoàng 
Thẩm 
SENIOR JAVA 
Profile

with 6 years of working 
experience within the IT 
industry.

being able to write and 
code programs in 
accordance with a brief, 
investigation, analytical 
defects and perform well 
under pressure. 
I am looking for an 
ambitious company which 
will challenge me to reach a 
higher level, develop my 
solving problem skills and 
give me a chance to 
develop my knowledge and 
potential.
